ru.jango.j0widget.camera

Interface BitmapProcessor.BitmapProcessorListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleCameraFragment
    Enclosing class:
    BitmapProcessor

    public static interface BitmapProcessor.BitmapProcessorListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onProcessingFailed(java.net.URI dataID, java.lang.Exception e)
      Is called on main thread when the data processing failed.
      void onProcessingFinished(java.net.URI dataID, byte[] data, android.graphics.Bitmap thumbnail)
      Is called on main thread when the data was successfully processed.

    • Method Detail

      • onProcessingFinished

        void onProcessingFinished(java.net.URI dataID,
                        byte[] data,
                        android.graphics.Bitmap thumbnail)
        Is called on main thread when the data was successfully processed.
        Parameters:
        dataID - URI, that was passed in BitmapProcessor constructor
        data - processed bitmap as byte array
        thumbnail - the same bitmap, but resized to BitmapProcessor.getThumbnailSize()

      • onProcessingFailed

        void onProcessingFailed(java.net.URI dataID,
                      java.lang.Exception e)
        Is called on main thread when the data processing failed.
        Parameters:
        dataID - URI, that was passed in BitmapProcessor constructor
        e - fail reason
